name: Biplane Racer
description:
Biplane racer is a 2D racing game that puts you in a cartoon biplane to race against other goofy animals in hazard filled aerial race tracks.

Play the adventure in solo similar to traditional platformer, but “in the air” as you fly through the level to reach the finish line by avoiding obstacles and hazards.

You will find mini-bosses and other challengers to race against in the world map as you complete levels.

You can race in Grand-Prix mode against the other characters (CPU) in solo or split-screen two players. Grab power ups in special balloons to use them to get advantages in the race. Along speed boosts or throwing birds out, each character has their own special power-up.

One wish shall be granted to the victorious participant of the grand prix!


• Adventure mode with 70+ levels
• Fast paced take on platformer style
• 16 Grand Prix races
• Split-screen two players
• 8 distinctive characters with different strengths
• Power-ups!
